root.Summary: Quantity of product at the page «оформить заказ» is incorrect
root.Precondition: Google Chrome is opened at Computer Desktop
root.Description: Despite of User has chosen two quantity of selected product, at the page «оформить заказ» is one unit of the product. User angelinatomashenko@gmail.com, password 1234
root.Attachments: video with steps, screenshot with defect
root.Steps_to_reproduce2: At Home page scroll down to bottom and choose Ukrainian language pressing button «укр»
root.Steps_to_reproduce3: Choose any product and click the link «купити»
root.Steps_to_reproduce4: Choose two quantity of the product and click link «оформити замовлення»
root.Actual_Result: there is one unit of selected product at the page «оформить заказ»
root.Expected_Result: there is two units of selected product at the page «оформить заказ»
